blocks.name: cgrtriv
blocks.content: Degenerate segments are congruent. Theorem 2.8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 28. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Jun-2013.)

thm cgrtriv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wbr(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)))

  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wbr(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)), wrex(hs0, cfv(cee, c0), wa(wbr(c1, cbtwn, cop(c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)))))
  syl122anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(cee, c0), wa(wbr(c1, cbtwn, cop(c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)))), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)))
  axsegcon(hs0, c0, c1, c1, c2, c2)
  rexlimdva(hs0, cfv(cee, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wa(wbr(c1, cbtwn, cop(c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c2, c2))), wbr(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)))
  adantld(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0))), wbr(c1, cbtwn, cop(c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)), wbr(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)))
  syli(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0))), wbr(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)), wbr(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)))
  syl13anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0))), wi(wbr(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)), wceq(c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0)))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0)))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cee, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cee, c0)))
  axcgrid(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  biimprd(wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)), wbr(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)))
  breq1d(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2), cop(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cop(c1, c1), ccgr, cop(c2, c2)))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0))→ < c1, c1 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0)), < c1, c1 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >, ∃(hs0 ∈(EE ` c0),(c1[Btwn]< c1, hs0 > ∧ < c1, hs0 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >)))
  syl122anc((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0)), ∃(hs0 ∈(EE ` c0),(c1[Btwn]< c1, hs0 > ∧ < c1, hs0 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >)), c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈(EE ` c0), c1 ∈(EE ` c0), c2 ∈(EE ` c0), c2 ∈(EE ` c0))
  simp1(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈(EE ` c0), c2 ∈(EE ` c0))

  axsegcon(hs0, c0, c1, c1, c2, c2)
  rexlimdva(hs0, (EE ` c0), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0)), (c1[Btwn]< c1, hs0 > ∧ < c1, hs0 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >), < c1, c1 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >)
  adantld(((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0))∧ hs0 ∈(EE ` c0)), c1[Btwn]< c1, hs0 >, < c1, hs0 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >, < c1, c1 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >)
  syli(((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0))∧ hs0 ∈(EE ` c0)), < c1, hs0 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >, < c1, c1 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >, c1 = hs0)
  syl13anc(((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0))∧ hs0 ∈(EE ` c0)), (< c1, hs0 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 > → c1 = hs0), c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈(EE ` c0), hs0 ∈(EE ` c0), c2 ∈(EE ` c0))
  simpl1(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈(EE ` c0), c2 ∈(EE ` c0), hs0 ∈(EE ` c0))
  simpl2(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈(EE ` c0), c2 ∈(EE ` c0), hs0 ∈(EE ` c0))
  simpr((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈(EE ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(EE ` c0)), hs0 ∈(EE ` c0))
  simpl3(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈(EE ` c0), c2 ∈(EE ` c0), hs0 ∈(EE ` c0))
  axcgrid(c0, c1, hs0, c2)
  biimprd(c1 = hs0, < c1, hs0 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >, < c1, c1 >[Cgr]< c2, c2 >)
  breq1d(< c1, c1 >, ccgr, < c2, c2 >, < c1, hs0 >, c1 = hs0)
  opeq2(c1, hs0, c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
